prompts.text: {player1}, take a sip
Everyone who's wearing black drinks
Youngest player drinks
Last person to raise their hand drinks
Everyone who checked their phone in the last hour drinks
{player1} and {player2}, cheers! Both drink
Waterfall! {player1} starts, everyone follows. Can't stop until the person before you stops
{player1}, pick someone to drink with you
Everyone who's been to a wedding this year drinks
Categories! {player1} picks a topic. Go around - first to hesitate drinks!
{player1}, guess {player2}'s middle name. Wrong = drink, Right = they drink
Never have I ever... {player1} picks. Everyone who has, drinks!
Everyone votes: who's most likely to black out tonight? That person drinks!
Thumb master! {player1} can put their thumb on the table anytime - last to notice drinks!
{player1} makes a rule. Break it = drink. Lasts 3 rounds!
Everyone who's lied today drinks. {player1} decides how many sips
Rock paper scissors tournament! Losers drink, winner gives out 5 drinks
{player1}, drink for every ex you've had
Social! Everyone drinks!
{player1} picks a number 1-6. Roll the dice (or random) - if it matches, everyone else drinks. If not, you drink that many
{player1}, give a compliment to everyone or finish your drink
{player1}, show your most recent selfie or drink 3 times
{player1}, do your best impression of {player2}
{player1}, let the group pick a song. You have to dance to the whole thing
{player1}, read aloud your last 3 text messages or drink 5 times
{player1}, call the 5th contact in your phone and sing happy birthday
{player1}, let {player2} post anything on your Instagram story
{player1}, switch shirts with {player2}
{player1}, speak in an accent for the next 3 rounds
{player1}, let someone draw on your face with marker
{player1}, show your screen time report
{player1}, give your phone to {player2} for 1 minute. They can do anything except delete things
{player1}, eat a spoonful of something spicy or drink 4 times
{player1}, keep your eyes closed for the next 2 rounds
{player1}, propose to {player2} on one knee. Make it convincing!
{player1}, do a dramatic reading of your last sent email
{player1}, let the group give you a new hairstyle
{player1}, text 'I love you' to someone random in your contacts
{player1}, describe {player2} using only compliments for 30 seconds
{player1}, act out your morning routine. Group guesses what you're doing
{player1}, what's the most embarrassing thing in your search history?
{player1}, what's a lie you've told this week?
{player1}, what's your body count? Drink that many or drink 10 for not answering
{player1}, what's the pettiest reason you've rejected someone?
{player1}, what's a secret you've never told anyone here?
{player1}, who in this room would you trust with your phone unlocked?
{player1}, what's the worst thing you've done while drunk?
{player1}, who was your last crush?
{player1}, what's something you pretend to like but actually hate?
{player1}, what's the most illegal thing you've done?
{player1}, who in this room have you stalked on social media?
{player1}, what's a red flag you ignored in your last relationship?
{player1}, what's your most embarrassing celebrity crush?
{player1}, what's the longest you've gone without showering?
{player1}, what's a rumor about you that's actually true?
{player1}, what's your most irrational fear?
{player1}, what's the meanest thing you've said about someone here?
{player1}, who do you secretly judge the most?
{player1}, what's a guilty pleasure you're ashamed of?
{player1}, what's the weirdest thing you've done alone?
{player1}, is a hot dog a sandwich? Defend your answer for 30 seconds
{player1}, what's an opinion that would get you cancelled?
{player1}, which overrated celebrity do you not understand the hype for?
{player1}, what's a popular movie you think is trash?
Debate time! {player1} and {player2} - pineapple on pizza. One for, one against. GO!
{player1}, what's a relationship dealbreaker that others might find shallow?
{player1}, rank everyone here by who you'd want on your apocalypse team
{player1}, what's a food combination everyone thinks is weird but you love?
{player1}, what's an unpopular opinion about this friend group?
{player1}, what popular trend do you think is stupid?
{player1}, rate everyone's fashion sense from 1-10. Explain your lowest rating
{player1}, what's the most overrated thing in life?
{player1}, which fictional character would you fight on sight?
{player1}, what's your most boomer or zoomer take?
Everyone vote: which celebrity is secretly the worst person? Debate!
{player1}, do 10 pushups or drink 3 times
{player1}, plank until the next prompt or drink 5 times
{player1} vs {player2} - arm wrestle! Loser drinks
Everyone does jumping jacks until someone quits. Quitters drink!
{player1}, balance on one foot for 30 seconds while everyone tries to make you laugh
{player1}, attempt to do a cartwheel. Group rates it 1-10
Thumb war! {player1} vs {player2}. Loser drinks twice
{player1}, do your best yoga pose and hold it for 20 seconds
Last person to touch their nose drinks!
{player1}, spin around 10 times then try to walk in a straight line
Staring contest! {player1} vs {player2}. First to blink drinks
{player1}, hold a cup on your head while standing on one foot. Drop it = drink 3
{player1}, do a handstand against the wall for 10 seconds
Musical chairs! Losers drink!
{player1}, wall sit until your next turn
{player1}, give {player2} your best first impression of them
Go around the circle and give one genuine compliment to each person
{player1}, who here would you want as your roommate and why?
{player1}, describe everyone here in 3 words each
Two truths and a lie! {player1} goes. Group guesses the lie. Wrong guesses drink!
{player1}, who do you think is most likely to become famous?
Everyone writes down their celebrity crush. {player1} reads them out - match person to crush!
{player1}, swap seats with the person you know least well. Get to know each other for 1 minute
{player1}, share the story of your most embarrassing moment
Everyone guess {player1}'s dream vacation spot. Closest guess = {player1} drinks!
{player1}, teach everyone a new skill in 60 seconds
{player1}, what would your dating profile say?
Story time! {player1} starts with one sentence. Each person adds one sentence. Goes for 2 rounds
{player1}, who here would you want to be stranded on an island with?
Speed dating round! Everyone has 30 seconds to ask {player1} anything
{player1}, sing the chorus of your favorite song. Group rates it!
{player1}, write a haiku about {player2}. You have 60 seconds
{player1}, give a TED talk on why you're the best. 45 seconds, GO!
{player1}, rap about the last thing you ate
{player1}, do your best celebrity impression. Group guesses who!
One word story! Go around adding one word each. {player1} starts. Anyone who hesitates drinks!
{player1}, create a new dance move and name it. Everyone has to learn it!
{player1}, do your best movie villain monologue
{player1} and {player2}, act out a scene from a movie. Group guesses the movie!
{player1}, speak only in questions for the next 3 rounds. Break it = drink
{player1}, do a dramatic reading of the last text you received
{player1}, do your best impression of a terrible infomercial for any object in this room
Roast battle! {player1} vs {player2}. Each gets 30 seconds. Group picks a winner!
{player1}, make up a backstory for how {player2} got their name
{player1}, sing everything you say for the next 2 rounds
Phone roulette! {player1} scrolls to a random photo, shows it, and explains the context
Russian roulette! Roll a dice. 1 = finish your drink. 2-6 = safe!
Everyone switches drinks! Person to your right's drink is now yours
Chaos vote! Everyone secretly points at someone. Most votes = finish your drink
Silent round! No one can talk until the next prompt. First to speak finishes their drink
{player1}, you're the dealer. Give out 10 drinks however you want
Reverse! The game now goes in the opposite direction
{player1}, pick someone. You're both immune from drinking for 2 rounds
Wildcard! {player1} makes up any rule for the rest of the game
Floor is lava! Last person to get their feet off the ground drinks 5 times
Telephone! {player1} whispers a secret to {player2}. Goes around. Compare start and end!
Power shift! {player1}, swap chaos levels with {player2}. Their drinks become yours!
{player1}, close your eyes and point. Whoever you point at chooses: truth or dare!
Alliance! {player1} picks a partner. You share all drinks for the next 3 rounds
Random! Everyone rolls a dice (or picks 1-6). Highest number gives out drinks = everyone else's total
Medusa! Everyone looks down. On 3, look up. If you make eye contact with someone, both drink!
Truth booth! {player1} answers any question from each player honestly or takes a shot
{player1}, Viking mode! Point at someone and say 'VIKING!' They must make rowing motions while neighbors make rowing sounds. Slowest drinks!
Dictator! {player1} is in charge for 2 rounds. Their word is law!
Confession roulette! Everyone writes a secret. {player1} picks one and reads it. Author takes 3 drinks
Most likely to! Everyone points at who's most likely to become a millionaire. Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to go viral? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to get arrested? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to cry at a movie? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to survive a horror movie? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to forget someone's birthday? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to become president? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to get into a bar fight? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to win a reality TV show? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to marry rich? Most votes drinks!
{player1} vs {player2}, trivia showdown! First to answer wrong drinks. Topic: capitals
Speed round! {player1} has 30 seconds to name 10 countries. Miss = drink for each missed
{player1}, without looking, guess what {player2}'s phone wallpaper is. Wrong = drink twice
{player1} and {player2}, say the same word at the same time. You have 3 tries. Fail = both drink
{player1}, make a toast. It has to be at least 3 sentences. Everyone drinks at the end!
{player1}, you have 10 seconds to make {player2} laugh. Fail = drink 3 times
Accent round! Everyone must speak in an accent until the next prompt. {player1} picks the accent!
{player1}, what's the last lie you told? If group doesn't believe it's the truth, drink twice!
{player1}, show the group your most-used emoji. Explain why
Psychic round! Everyone guess {player1}'s favorite song. Best guess = {player1} drinks
{player1}, rank your exes by how good they were at texting back
Imitation game! {player1} acts like {player2} for 30 seconds. {player2} rates accuracy
{player1}, what's something you'd never admit to your parents?
Hot seat! {player1} answers rapid fire questions for 30 seconds. Pass on any = drink!
Everyone who hasn't texted back someone in their phone for 3+ days drinks!
{player1}, do your best TikTok dance
{player1}, what's the worst pickup line you've actually used?
{player1}, what's a compliment you want to give {player2} but never have?
Speed compliments! Go around giving {player1} one compliment each. 3 seconds max per person!
{player1}, if you had to date one person here, who and why? They drink!
Conspiracy theory time! {player1} has 30 seconds to convince us of any fake theory
{player1}, recreate your last Instagram post IRL right now

sexy.text: {player1}, demonstrate your best pickup line on {player2}. Group rates it 1-10!
{player1}, who here has the best smile?
{player1}, give {player2} a 30-second shoulder massage or drink 3 times
Everyone who's kissed someone in this room drinks!
{player1}, what's your biggest turn-on?
{player1}, rank everyone here by attractiveness or finish your drink
{player1} and {player2}, staring contest. First to look away has to compliment the other's appearance
{player1}, what's the most romantic thing you've ever done?
Kiss, marry, kill with people in this room. {player1} answers!
{player1}, show your dating app profile to the group
Everyone who's sent a risky text in the last week drinks!
{player1}, what's your type in 5 words?
{player1}, do a seductive walk across the room
{player1}, give someone here a flirty compliment
{player1}, what's your worst date story?
Truth or drink! {player1}, what's your body count?
{player1}, whisper something to {player2}. They decide if you drink based on what you said
{player1}, who was your celebrity crush growing up?
Seven minutes in heaven, but just a compliment battle. {player1} and {player2} take turns complimenting each other!
{player1}, read aloud your last flirty text
Smash or pass: {player1} picks 3 celebrities. Everyone answers!
{player1}, describe your ideal first date in detail
{player1}, serenade {player2} with any love song
{player1}, what's the most embarrassing thing in your 'For You' page?
{player1}, who here would you swipe right on?
Most likely to! Who's most likely to slide into a celebrity's DMs? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to get married first? Most votes drinks!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to have a secret admirer? Most votes drinks!
{player1}, what's a deal-breaker that you know is unreasonable?
{player1}, describe {player2} as a dating profile
